name: REEF SHARK

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The shark has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The shark can breathe only underwater.
